usage.cn: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。
usage.eng: I am a slow walker,but I never walk backwards.

usage.cn: 要理解生活，必须往后看；但要生活好，则必须向前看。
usage.eng: Life can only be understood backwards, but it must be lived forwards.

usage.cn: 我喜欢并习惯了对变化的东西保持着距离，这样才会知道什么是最不会被时间抛弃的准则。比如爱一个人，充满变数，我于是后退一步，静静的看着，直到看见真诚的感情。
usage.eng: I love and am used to keeping a distance with those changed things.Only in this way can I know what will not be abandoned by time. For example, when you love someone, changes are all around. Then I step backward and watching it silently, then I see the true feelings.
